meet_accept.cnct_txt: הצוות שלנו ייצור איתך קשר בהקדם

meet_reject.txt: האם אוכל לדעת את סיבת הדחייה? אם יש לך שאלה/הצעות או אם תרצה לקבוע את מועד הפגישה, אנא כתוב לנו באימייל. נחזור אליך בהקדם.

meet_stat.txt: אם אינך זמין לתאריך זה, אנא שלח לנו דוא"ל והודיע ​​לנו על מנת שנוכל לקבוע מועד אחר.

price_offer.title: הצעת מחיר מס'
price_offer.about: Broom Service was founder by Lidor Mamou on 2013 The company employs a team of professionals in a wide variety of house cleaning and maintenance jobs. Our staff are regular and experienced employees Our staff are regular and experienced employees who receive a fair and proper reward and all the beneﬁts they receive according to the law Our clients are accustomed and well acquainted with the high standard of service used in the best luxury and boutique hotels in Israel and worldwide and we strive to meet this high quality standard. Our customer satisfaction, high level of service, attention to detail and personal attitude are the foundations on which we base our services. The company is registered as a legal cleaning company in the Ministry of Industry. License number: 4569
price_offer.offer_title: What Do We Have To Offer?

thorough_cleaning.s1_3_ebasic: Interior and exterior windows including shutters, rails and frames.

thorough_cleaning.s1_9: Thorough washing of the floor and perfume of the apartment.
thorough_cleaning.s1_10_estandard: Thorough arrangement and cleaning: kitchen and pantry cabinets, wardrobes, general cabinets and drawers in the house, warehouse.
thorough_cleaning.s2_5r: Tasks: vents, air conditioners, lamps, electrical switches, panels, doors, handles and lintels.
